title: Pixel 3 - call history search
content:
I am unable to search through call history. In my Samsung and Apple devices I can start to dial a number. The dialer will populate a list of all incoming/outgoing calls. Even if the number is not a contact.

How do you search for phone numbers that are not contacts, without scrolling through history.

How do I filter outgoing and incoming calls?

Is there a dialer similar to Samsung?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
